mapper.update: INSERT INTO patient (userId, name, sex, age, oldHistory, allergiesHistory, habits) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{oldHistory}, #{allergiesHistory}, #{habits}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), sex = VALUES(sex), age = VALUES(age), oldHistory = VALUES(oldHistory), allergiesHistory = VALUES(allergiesHistory), habits = VALUES(habits)
